Publication Title: MOBILE pipeline enables identification of context-specific networks and regulatory mechanisms
Publication Authors: Cemal Erdem, Sean M Gross, Laura M Heiser, Marc R Birtwistle
Publication Abstract: Robust identification of context-specific network features that control cellular phenotypes remains a challenge. We here introduce MOBILE (Multi-Omics Binary Integration via Lasso Ensembles) to nominate molecular features associated with cellular phenotypes and pathways.
